Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Schuch D, Ibarra-Espinosa S, Dias de Freitas E (2018). “EmissV: An R package to create vehicular and other emissions by Top-down methods to air quality models.” The Journal of Open Source Software, 6. doi:10.21105/joss.00662, https://joss.theoj.org/papers/10.21105/joss.00662.
